item.title: Boond - Tracking and reducing water consumption
item.description: My Masters thesis project in GID on helping people reduce their water consumption while travelling.

item.title: Project X - Safe media sharing at protests
item.description: An image capturing and sharing platform protecting the privacy of protestors.

item.title: Shape - Designing the Future of Music
item.description: Envisioning the future of music in 20 years, helping people answer the question, WHAT KIND OF MUSIC DO YOU LIKE?

item.title: Superthrower bowling machine
item.description: I was selected by Bang Design , an award winning design firm in Bangalore, to work on the Superthrower cricket bowling machine being developed by Freebowler LLC .

item.title: Design analysis of a Single-Effect Solar Still
item.description: My Masters thesis project on analysing and improving the efficiency of passive single effect solar stills.

item.title: GrabBin
item.description: Designing a retrofittable attachment to community dustbins that cleans the vicinity of the dustbin

item.title: Lumbar support for drivers
item.description: Prolonged driving is one of the main causes for lower back pain in men, this is due to improper posture and poorly designed seats.

item.title: Design of a Hot hatchback - Project RP
item.description: Outline the specifications and design of a hot hatchback targeted at the Indian automobile market.

item.title: Efficiency of Electric Vehicles
item.description: The energy efficiency of electric vehicles is analysed and compared against conventional ICE vehicles.

item.title: Optimal Control of Mircogrids
item.description: This project explored various control strategies for operating energy microgrids.

item.title: Saarang Mobile Application
item.description: The development of the Android application for the cultural festival of the Indian Institute of Technology Madras.
